item.title: Deal of the day: Fly to Amsterdam this spring or summer from only 12,000 Virgin points
item.description: Book now: Fly nonstop to Amsterdam from select U.S. cities for as little as 12,000 Virgin points, with wide availability for spring and summer travel.

item.title: The 10 best luxury cruise lines for elegance and exclusivity
item.description: Inclusive fares, gourmet dining, spacious suites and impeccable service are hallmarks of the top luxury cruise lines.

item.title: Delta drops latest signal 'basic' first- and business-class fares could be coming soon
item.description: Delta Air Lines seems to be on the verge of taking the "basic economy" concept and adapting it for its high-end cabins.

item.title: Deal alert: Fly American Airlines business class to Prague or Budapest for 55,000 Atmos Rewards points
item.description: You can fly American Airlines' new route from Philadelphia to Prague or Budapest for just 55,000 Atmos Rewards points in business class.
